1. Download and install Steam via Crossover. If you need it dl it from this torrent.
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4971142/CrossOver_8_Pro

3. Scroll down about three quarters of the way until you see the line that ends in "iw4sp.exe."

4. To get multiplayer to correctly launch, change "iw4sp.exe" to "iw4mp.exe," than save the plist.

5. Login Steam, put your windows key code or find a cracked iw4mp so you can play without a key.

6. Launch CoD MW2 and you'll be running in MP! To change back to single just change the iw4mp.exe back to iw4sp.exe.
